snippet.title: Classic Game Room - SPACE INVADERS for Atari 2600 review
snippet.description:
Space Invaders Atari 2600 review. http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com
Classic Game Room reviews SPACE INVADERS for the Atari 2600 video game console VCS.  

Space Invaders is one of the most famous arcade, coin-op, old school, stand up, retro, arcade quarter eating video games from the early 1980's.  Space Invaders was such a huge game on the Atari 2600 that it had multiple releases, cover art and cartridge designs! Will it ever appear on Xbox 360, Xbox Arcade (XBLA), Wii or PS3?  

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. Classic Game Room was the original classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999-2000, now on DVD.
